text:
I have strange problem... I write applet that send post requests to servlet. 
When servlet try to read applet request occurs error.

This happens when used ajp13 connector, but with ajp12 all fine.

Platform:
PC,Win2000 Server  
Apache 1.3.14
Tomcat 3.2.1, connected to Apache via apj13 connector.
creator: burenkov@nikita.ru

We are having a similar problem.  The stack trace that appears is listed below.

Tomcat version is 3.2.1, the server is Red Hat Linux release 7.0, Kernel 
2.2.16-22.  The problem occurs 
when we use a HTML form to POST a binary to a servlet.  Very small files (~100 
bytes) work fine but anything above (~350 bytes) throws the exception listed 
below.

We are using Jason Hunter's multipart request handling servlets 
(www.servlets.com/cos) but from the stacktrace it seems like the problem occurs 
prior to touching those methods.

I can be contacted at a.kirby@qut.edu.au
